thread.title: Cheryl confirms pregnancy in self-worth campaign photo
thread.title_full: Cheryl confirms pregnancy in self-worth campaign photo | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Cheryl confirms pregnancy in self-worth campaign photo
text:
Credit: L'Oreal/PA Pop star Cheryl has confirmed she is pregnant by cradling her baby bump in an official photograph for the first time, while taking part in a new campaign.
She has previously refused to comment that she and her boyfriend, One Direction star Liam Payne, from Wolverhampton, were expecting a baby.
The former X Factor judge Cheryl was pictured alongside the likes of Dame Helen Mirren and TV personality Katie Piper.
The photo is part of a collaborative campaign between The Prince's Trust and L'Oreal Paris to help raise the confidence of young people struggling with self-doubt.
The charity and the beauty brand are keen to turn young people's self-doubt into self-worth.
The celebrities taking part are sharing their personal stories about how they have been affected by confidence issues.
Credit: PA Images Last updated Thu 23 Wolverhampton One Direction
